definition: to have an affair with sb
to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be
to dye/to catch (a disease)/to acquire (bad habits etc)/to contaminate/to add color washes to a painting

sentences.english: Were you aware he was ball-deep in some Washington wonk ?
sentences.chinese: 你知道他和華盛頓的一個書呆子有染嗎？

sentences.english: There are many answers, and those answers are natural conditions of the affair.
sentences.chinese: 答案有很多，那些答案自然也是與情有染的。

sentences.english: Maradona has been playing on drugs for most of his career.
sentences.chinese: 馬拉多納足球生涯中大半時間與毒品有染。

sentences.english: Do you think I am the vat with anyone, having an affair.
sentences.chinese: 你以爲我是染缸啊，跟誰都有染。

sentences.english: Had an affair with King Dolgare, and became pregnant with his child.
sentences.chinese: 她與特爾嘉亞王有染，甚至還懷上了他的孩子。

sentences.english: Lightman: You think he was shagging his boss?
sentences.chinese: 你認爲他跟他的上司有染？

sentences.english: His affair with his ex-wife has ticked his wife off .
sentences.chinese: 他和前妻有染，讓他太太發火。

sentences.english: Yuxiang mistook Qiumei and Shanguo slept together and complains to Dolly about it.
sentences.chinese: 玉香卻誤會山國與秋梅有染，向多莉哭訴。

definition: to have secret ties with/to be in covert communication with (the enemy etc)/to engage in an illicit sexual relationship/adultery
to carry on a clandestine love affair
to conspire to murder/to plot against sb's life
to have a falling out/to have a big argument
